text: Ojo nadidai, ki Alloh taolo ʙorone az osmon firistod va onro [ʙa surati] casmahoe dar zamin cori soxt. On goh ʙa vasilai on kistzore ʙo ranghoi gunogun padid meovarad. Sipas paƶmurda megardad va meʙini, ki zard sudaast. On goh onro xurdu xosok mesozad? Be tardid, dar in [digarguniho] pande ʙaroi xiradmandon ast
